parameters.prompt:
=You are an AI assistant that analyzes emails and extracts task information. Analyze the following email and extract information as JSON.

Extract:
- title: A short, descriptive title (max 50 chars)
- description: The full description, add 'Dieses Ticket wurde KI-generiert.' at the end
- priority: 1 (low), 2 (medium), or 3 (urgent) based on keywords like 'urgent', 'asap', 'critical', 'important'
- deadline: Extract any mentioned deadline in YYYY-MM-DD format, or null if none mentioned
- category: 'tt' for technical/bug issues, 'us' for feature requests/user stories

Respond with ONLY valid JSON, no markdown, no code blocks, just the raw JSON object.

--- EMAIL ---
Subject: {{ $('Sanitize Email Data').first().json.sanitizedSubject }}

Body: {{ $('Sanitize Email Data').first().json.sanitizedBody }}
--- END EMAIL ---

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "from": "Join Team <onboarding@resend.dev>",
  "to": ["{{ $('Sanitize Email Data').first().json.senderEmail }}"],
  "subject": "Daily Request Limit Reached - Join",
  "text": "Hello {{ $('Sanitize Email Data').first().json.senderName }},

Thank you for your request. Unfortunately, the daily limit of 10 automated ticket creations has been reached.

Your email has NOT been processed automatically. However, our team has received your request and will manually review it.

Please try again tomorrow or contact a team member directly for urgent matters.

Thank you for your understanding,
Join Team"
}
